name: This is the Hero's Story After All (arustedknight)
name_original: This is the Hero's Story After All (arustedknight)
description:
Jam Version can be found here: https://arustedknight.itch.io/this-is-the-heros-story-after-all-jam

Play as an Evil Lord and his minions to help the new Adventurer Succeed. This is his story after all.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

L ThumbStick / WASD: Move or Navigate Menus

Button South / Space :  Jump

Button West / C : Track the Hero

Bumpers / q-e: Cycle Minions

Escape / Select Button: Skip Dialog or cutscene.

Music: https://wingless-seraph.net/en/

**Solo Dev Made in 72 Hours for the Wowie Game Jam 3.0 (First Jam ever for me)

*****NOTE: Controller May not work in the WebGL Build, if you're determined to play with a controller, I recommend Downloading and Playing that way

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changes From the jam version:

- Indicator for the Hero when Off Screen,

- Minions should now reset Fire Timers and Turn timers on level reset

- jump SFX and particles added

- Number of Minions and Current Minion Selected Text added to UI

- Various map texture changes

- level 4 over haul including easier spike maneuver and reduced size of the map from 14 minions to 8 total.

- "Evil Lord" text over Health Bar

- Dialog Portrait no longer smear.

- Evil Lord Fireball Effect Changes.

- Clearer Minion Particles for when about to fire/turn around.
